name: Warplanes Above, People Below
description:
After 56 days of the Azure War, Little girl Alison and her mother Karlie were hiding in an underground air-raid shelter, but Karlie's health was getting worse. In order to survive, Alison had to go to the ground alone and risk her life to find food...

Basic attributes:

The mother's poor physical state will affect the daughter's mental state. The daughter's spirit would be deducted by 60 if she did not come home at dark. The mother would die if she never took the morphine.
